Terms of Use

Last Updated: January 2025

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing and using SD Studios' website and services, you acknowledge and agree to these terms of use. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our services.

2. Intellectual Property

2.1 Ownership

All content, including but not limited to designs, graphics, text, and code, is the property of SD Studios and is protected by intellectual property laws.

2.2 Usage Rights

Clients receive specific usage rights as outlined in their service agreements. These rights do not transfer ownership of the original work unless explicitly stated in writing.

2.3 Portfolio Rights

SD Studios reserves the right to showcase completed work in our portfolio and promotional materials unless otherwise agreed upon in writing.

3. Service Terms

3.1 Project Scope

All projects require a clearly defined scope of work. Changes to the scope may result in additional costs and timeline adjustments.

3.2 Client Responsibilities

  • Provide necessary materials and information promptly
  • Review and provide feedback within agreed timeframes
  • Ensure all provided content adheres to applicable laws
  • Make payments according to agreed schedule

4. Payment Terms

Payment schedules and methods will be outlined in project proposals. We typically require:

  • 50% deposit to commence work
  • Remaining balance upon project completion
  • Additional charges for scope changes

5. Website Usage

When using our website, you agree to:

  • Not attempt to breach security measures
  • Not use automated systems or bots
  • Not collect user information without consent
  • Not engage in activities that may harm our services

6. Limitation of Liability

SD Studios provides services "as is" without warranties of any kind. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of our services, to the extent permitted by law.

7. Changes to Terms

We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of our services following any changes constitutes acceptance of those changes.

8. Contact Information

legal@sdstudios.com
+1 (234) 567-890

Have questions about our terms?
